Summary: These rooms are all on the ground floor level and the room is quite small and very basic. Could do with a lick of paint or a little upgrading.  But tv, microwave and fridge all included and the sink area is very nice.

Summary Heading: Shady business practice - they cancelled our room without calling!
Summary: Avoid this place at all costs, even if you see a good deal on an online booking site. We booked a room at a great rate through Hotels.com, but apparently it was too good of a deal because the hotel unilaterally cancelled our room and re-rented it to someone else. Upon check in at 3:30 p.m., they stated that there was a problem with the credit card and they had cancelled our room. Even if they were right, how about a phone call??? I have had that card for years, so there should not have been a problem. But in any event, who just cancels without calling the customer? To make matters worse, the check in clerk was completely unapologetic and rude. He was literally shooing my boyfriend away with his hand, like I don't have time for this, I've cancelled your room, why are you still

Summary Heading: very good place for the cost
Summary: We needed an inexpensive room for the night and chose this. Turned out to be a nice quiet and very clean room. Handy a grocery store and. restaurants. I would come back here again. I really liked how quiet it was.

Summary Heading: Bare Bones Motel to Crash at Coming to or From the OC Airport.
Summary: Looking for a cheap place to crash at arriving late in the evening to fly out of OC airport the next day, we booked the Newport Bay Inn ($70 significantly cheaper than other options in the same area.) This is an old style motel (drive right up to your door though parking is limited near doors but also available in the back of the property). Nice local host who helped us get to our room. There are no extras here (no ice machine, vending, breakfast, etc.) The rooms are fine -- stripped of old dusty carpets and drapes to make them a bit more modern and equipped with new tvs, mini fridges and microwaves. Internet was fine, but water was luke-warm in the shower. There is significant traffic noise and the well lit parking lot spills through the blinds so not the most conducive for a
Room tip: Get the rooms farthest from the road

Summary Heading: Typical highway motel - but newly renovated
Summary: I arrived very late and was the last guest to check-in, but staff was still very friendly and extremely helpful. The motel is newly renovated and the room was functional. The A/C was a bit difficult to regulate. I ended up turning it off during the night, which made the room a bit stuffy in the morning.
